Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A1:

Some time ago, a website talked about the risks of sharing our whereabouts online. The website said that when we share where we are, we are also telling many people, not all of whom we know. This made people think about the bad things that can happen when we share too much online.

A long time ago, some people started using the internet to share their lives with others. They wrote about their thoughts, feelings, and experiences. They even shared photos and stories. But they soon realized that sharing too much online can be dangerous. They got in trouble, lost friends, and even got fired from their jobs.

One of these early internet users was a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall. He started sharing his life online in 1994. He wrote about his thoughts, feelings, and experiences. He even shared photos and art. People loved reading about him and his life. But one day, he fell in love and wrote about it online. His girlfriend didn't like it and told him to stop writing about their relationship or she would leave him. Justin chose to stop writing about his life online.

Another person who shared her life online was Heather Armstrong. She wrote about her job and her life. But one day, her boss found out and she lost her job. This is called the "online distribution effect". It means that we might say things online that we wouldn't say in person. But our online life is connected to our real life. We should think carefully before sharing too much online.

Heather Armstrong learned a lesson. She stopped writing about her life online for a while, but then started again. This time, she wrote about her new family and her life as a mom. She became very popular and even made money from her writing. She learned that we can share our lives online, but we should be careful and think about the consequences.

Here is a simplified version of the text for a learner of level A1:

Some scientists were worried about a new film called What the Bleep Do We Know?. The film is a mix of documentary and drama and shows that we don't know a lot about the universe. This is true, and even scientists don't know everything. But some scientists didn't like the film and said it was wrong. They said it was like a magic show, and they didn't like the way it showed some scientific discoveries. One discovery is that water can be affected by our thoughts. This is amazing, but some scientists think it's not true because there's no proof. The film showed some pictures of ice crystals, but that's not enough proof. Scientists want to see more evidence before they believe something. 

Later in the article, it talks about some real scientific discoveries that are amazing. For example, scientists have found out that the universe is made of a special kind of matter and energy that we don't understand. They have also found out that our brains can't always understand what's happening around us because it takes a little time. And some scientists think that the universe was designed in a special way so that life could exist. These discoveries show that we don't know everything, and we might never know everything. Scientists are still trying to figure out the secrets of the universe.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text at level A1:

I like writing short stories. It's easy and fun. Writing novels is harder. It's like planting a big forest, while writing short stories is like planting a small garden. I like doing both. They help me become a better writer.

I write novels and short stories at different times. When I finish a novel, I want to write some short stories. When I finish a group of short stories, I want to write a novel. I don't write short stories while I'm writing a novel, and I don't write a novel while I'm writing short stories.

I started writing short stories in 1984. It was hard at first, but it was fun. I felt like I could do anything. My readers liked my short stories too.

I like writing short stories because they don't take long to finish. It's like a short trip. I can write a short story in a week. Novels take a long time. It's like a long trip. Sometimes I feel like giving up.

Short stories are fun because I can write about anything. It's like playing jazz music. If my idea doesn't work, I don't worry. I just try again. I can learn from my mistakes and use them in my next story.

My short stories are like little footprints in the sand. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. They are like a map to my heart. I'm happy to share these feelings with my readers.

Note: I've kept the main ideas and themes of the original text, but simplified the language and sentence structure to make it more accessible to A1 level learners. I've also removed some of the more complex vocabulary and literary references to make it easier to understand.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

'Science is very important. It helps us understand the world and make new things. Sometimes it helps us cure diseases and make our lives better. But sometimes it can also cause problems. Scientists are always trying to learn more, but they don't always agree on what they think they know. They make mistakes, but they also make new discoveries that change our understanding of the world. In the past, people thought they knew a lot about the world, but then new discoveries changed everything. Now, scientists are trying to figure out the whole universe, from the smallest things to the biggest things. This is not just about learning, it's also about being careful with the world and making sure we don't make mistakes that can harm people or the planet. We all need to pay attention to science and what it can do for us.'

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

'Ebooks were very popular for a while. But now, some big publishers are saying that ebook sales are not growing. In fact, some are even going down. This is making people wonder if ebooks will replace print books. One person in the publishing industry said that ebooks might have been a bad idea because people are not using them as much as they thought. But many people still think that ebooks and print books can coexist.

The idea that ebooks will replace print books is not new. People have been worried about this since the 1800s. They thought that new technologies like the phonograph would make books unnecessary. But radio, television, and other new technologies did not replace books. Instead, people found new ways to use them.

When new technologies come out, people often worry about losing the things they are used to. This is because we get attached to the things we use every day. We might even give names to our cars or computers. When something new comes along, we might feel sad that we can't use the old thing anymore. This is why some people still like old things, like vinyl records or cassette tapes.

The idea that ebooks will replace print books is just a story that people tell to make sense of change. It's a way to talk about how technology is changing our lives. But in reality, ebooks and print books can both be useful and fun. We don't have to choose between them.'

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

I write about famous people who do creative work. I want to know how they make time for their work and what they do every day. I think that if I know what they eat and when they sleep, I can learn about their personalities. This book is about how people make time for their work. It's not about the work itself, but about how they make time for it. I want to show how famous people make time for their work and how it affects their work.

I have a daily routine. I wake up early, brush my teeth, and have coffee. Then I write about famous people's daily routines. I want to know how they make time for their work and how they organize their days. Some people take naps, some people work at night, and some people work in the morning. I want to show how different people make time for their work.

I wrote this book because I struggle with making time for my work. I want to know how to make time for my work and still have a good life. I want to know if it's better to work a lot or a little bit every day. I don't have all the answers, but I can show you how other people make time for their work.

Here is a simplified version of the text, suitable for a learner of level A1:

Howard became a palaeontologist because of a change in his family's plans when he was six years old. His father had to cancel a trip to Spain due to rising interest rates. Instead, they went to the beach in England and Howard found an ammonite. He knew he wanted to be a palaeontologist from a young age. He studied the beginning of life on Earth, not the dinosaurs. He finished his studies and was worried about getting a job. He applied for a job at Tavistock College in London, but wasn't sure if he would get it. The person who was supposed to interview him was late and another professor took his place. This professor didn't like Howard's boss, so he made sure Howard got the job. Howard was surprised, but happy to have the job.

Later, Howard found out that a colleague had told him about the job, not the professor who interviewed him. Howard was happy to have the job and could do the work he loved. He often thought about how his professional life was organized and planned, but his personal life was not. One day, someone stole his briefcase with important notes for a lecture. He reported the theft and postponed the lecture. He met a colleague who told him about a new collection of fossils at the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard was excited and decided to go to the museum to study the fossils. He cancelled his other plans and saved up money to go to Nairobi.

Note: I've kept the main events and plot points, but simplified the language and sentence structure to make it more accessible to a level A1 learner. I've also removed some of the more complex vocabulary and phrases to make it easier to understand.<|eot_id|>

'Professor Charles Spence likes to eat different foods. He even has a special ice cream at home that is made from bee larvae. It might look strange, but it tastes a little bit sweet and floral. Professor Spence studies how our senses work together to make food taste good. He wants to know how we can make eating more enjoyable. He has found out some interesting things, like that the person who orders first at a restaurant usually likes their food the most. He also found out that we eat more food when we eat with other people.

Professor Spence has a special lab at Oxford University where he does his research. He works with cooks and food companies to make food better. He helps big food companies make their products healthier by reducing salt and sugar. He also works with famous chefs to create new dishes. He even helped a famous chef create a special dish that sounds like the sea!

Professor Spence likes to experiment with music and food. He found out that different types of music can make food taste different. He even has a special dinner party game where he plays different music and drinks to see how people like them. He loves to share his findings with others and make eating more enjoyable for everyone.'

"Our brains are very busy. We have a lot of information to deal with, and it's hard to know what's important and what's not. We used to ask travel agents to book our flights and salespeople to help us find what we need in shops. Now we do most things ourselves. We're doing many things at once, like checking our phones, watching TV, and talking to friends. But our brains are not good at doing many things at once. We think we're doing many things, but really we're just switching between them quickly. This can make us feel stressed and confused.

Our brains are not good at handling too much information. It's like trying to juggle many balls at once. We might think we're doing a good job, but really we're not getting much done. We're also making a lot of small decisions, like answering emails, and this can be tiring for our brains. It's hard to make good decisions when we're tired.

Many people say that the problem is the amount of email we receive. We feel like we have to answer every email, but it's hard to do this and get anything else done. It's like our brains are too busy to think clearly."

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A1:

'A long time ago, people thought animals just did things without thinking. They didn't think animals had feelings or a sense of right and wrong. But now, scientists are studying animal behavior and they're finding out that animals can think and feel. For example, a chimpanzee at a zoo broke up concrete to throw at visitors. Was he being mean? And in the US, female bats help other bats have babies. Are they being kind?

Scientists are learning more about animal feelings and it's making us think about how we treat animals. We're eating animals, like cows, and we're wondering if it's right. Some scientists say we should stop eating meat because animals can think and feel. Others say we should just be kind to animals and not eat them.

It's a big debate. Some people think animals can think and feel like us, while others think they're different. We can't know for sure what it's like to be an animal, but we can try to be kind to them.'

Here is the simplified text, suitable for A1 level learners:

'Critical thinking is when we use our brains to understand what we read or hear. We try to think deeply about it. Adrian West, a researcher, says that technology can help us learn and remember things, but it can also make it harder to think deeply. We are exposed to a lot of information, but it can be hard to make sense of it all.

Many people think that reading is important for critical thinking. When we read, we use our imagination and think deeply about what we are reading. But now, many people are reading less and watching more TV and playing video games. This can make it harder to think deeply.

Some people think that video games can actually help us think better. They can teach us important skills like decision-making and problem-solving. These games can also help us explore new ideas and concepts.

It's important to understand how technology affects our thinking. We need to be careful not to just accept what we see and hear, but to think critically about it.'

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of level A1:

Matthew Crawford is a writer and a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office, but he didn't like it. He likes his job now because he can work with his hands. His first book was about why manual work is good. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life.

Matthew noticed that when he was shopping, advertisements started popping up on the credit card machine while he was entering his PIN number. He realized that these ads are everywhere and are hard to avoid. They take our attention away from what we really want to think about. We can't even remember conversations we've had because we're always being interrupted.

Everyone is trying to avoid being interrupted, so we close ourselves off and don't talk to strangers. We see the world through screens and apps, and they make us want more and more. Matthew is worried about this.

He thinks that we should focus on the things that are real, like talking to people and doing things with our hands. He gives examples of people who have to focus on the world around them, like cooks, hockey players, and motorbike racers. They can't just use a screen to get what they need.

Matthew thinks we should find ways to use our judgment and pay attention to what's real. This can help us focus on what's important and make it easier to talk to others.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

'What do you do for a living?' This is a common question we ask when we meet someone new. But when you're a philosopher, it's a bit tricky to answer. Some people think that saying you're a philosopher means you're smart and know a lot of big words. But that's not true. Philosophers are just people who think about important questions and try to find answers.

A long time ago, some famous philosophers like Aristotle and Socrates said that thinking about big questions is important. They thought that people should think about what's right and wrong, and how to live a good life. But it's not just about reading big books or being a expert. It's about thinking about the things that happen in our daily lives.

Some people think that philosophers are too smart and don't care about what regular people think. But that's not true. Philosophers want to help people think about their lives and make good choices. They want to help people understand what's important and what's not.

I'm a philosopher, and I like to think about big questions like 'Is it okay to download movies for free?' or 'How do we decide what's right and wrong?' I think that by thinking about these questions, we can learn more about ourselves and the world around us. And that's what being a philosopher is all about.

Here is a rewritten version of the text at a level suitable for A1 learners:

Food is a big part of our lives. We eat every day and enjoy it with our friends and family. Some people love food so much that they think about it a lot. They might wonder why we eat what we eat and how we should eat it. 

In the past, people who thought about big questions didn't talk much about food. They talked about other important things like how to learn and grow. When they did talk about food, it was usually just a way to explain something else. 

One old Greek philosopher named Epicurus liked to enjoy good food and drink. His name is now used to name restaurants and food shops. This is because people think that if something is good enough for a famous philosopher, it must be good! 

Food is special because it's something we share with others. We grow and cook food with the help of our communities. We also share food with our friends and family. This makes food an important topic to think about. 

Some people write about food and tell us what they think about it. But why do they get to decide what's good or bad? It's not because they're experts, but because they're good at describing what food tastes like. 

Food can also be beautiful, like a painting or a song. Some people think that food should be included in discussions about beauty. But food is eaten and gone, so it can't be beautiful in the same way that a painting or a song can. 

There are also important questions about what we should eat. Should we eat food that's good for the planet or food that's good for us? These are important questions that can help us understand what we believe. 

Finally, food can bring people together. When we cook for our friends and family, we show them we care. When we cook for strangers, we have to think about what's best for everyone. Food can even help us understand people from other cultures. When we eat with them, we learn about their customs and traditions. 

This text is interesting because it talks about food in a way that makes us think about why we eat what we eat and how we can make the most of our food.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

Rob Daviau from the US makes special board games. He thought old board games were not fun or challenging anymore. He wondered if board games could have a story. He took an old game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, the decisions players make affect the game in a big way. Players might have to tear up cards or damage the board. The game is played over many sessions, and players can remember what happened before. Daviau worked on another game called Pandemic. This game is about saving the world from diseases. He also made a game called SeaFall. In this game, players are sailors and explore the ocean.

Designers of legacy games have to think about all the choices players can make to make the story work. They test the games to see how they will play out. Jaime Barriga was a tester for SeaFall. He said it takes a lot of time to play the game and sometimes it gets broken. Legacy games were not expected to be popular, but many people love them. They like the idea of playing a new game every time.

Rob Daviau thought it would be a special game, but not many people would play it. But many people, like Russell Chapman, love legacy games. He says it's exciting to learn something new every time he plays. Ben Hogg likes the idea of an adventure that unfolds. He says it's like watching a TV series. The idea of legacy games comes from video games and TV shows. Matt Leacock, the creator of Pandemic, says designing a legacy game is like writing a book. You need to have an idea of where it starts and ends, but also be flexible. Rob Daviau is happy to see others make their own legacy games.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A1:

'One night, a clever octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at the New Zealand Aquarium. He climbed out of the tank, crossed the floor, and slid into a small pipe that led to the ocean. This is a fun story that many people loved reading online. We like to imagine that animals are like us, doing clever things. Octopuses are especially interesting because they are very smart, but they have bodies that are very different from ours. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play games. Some scientists think that we should not be surprised by how smart animals are. They say that we often forget that animals can do things that we thought were only human. 

In the past, people thought that animals were not very smart. But now we know that animals can think about the past and the future, feel sorry for each other, and even understand what others are thinking. 

Some people used to think that animals were very smart, even in the past. A long time ago, people thought that animals could be put on trial for doing bad things. And a famous scientist named Charles Darwin said that the difference between humans and animals is not as big as we thought.

But in the 20th century, people started to think that animals were not very smart. They thought that animals just reacted to things, like machines. This was a sad time for animals, because people were hurting the environment and treating animals badly.

Now, scientists are learning more about animal intelligence. They are designing special tests to see how smart animals are, and they are finding out that animals are much smarter than we thought. For example, squirrels can remember where they hid their food, and octopuses can change the color of their skin.

Some people think that if an octopus could test human intelligence, it would be very easy for humans to fail. We are not as good at changing colors as octopuses are!'

Note: I have kept the main ideas and facts of the original text, but simplified the language and sentence structure to make it accessible to a learner of level A1. I have also removed some complex vocabulary and concepts to make the text more readable for this level.<|eot_id|>

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for a learner of level A1:

"Robots are changing the way we work. They used to be only in science fiction, but now they're becoming a reality. Many experts think that robots will soon be used in many industries, not just in factories. This will change many jobs. Some people think that robots will take over most jobs, but many people also think that their jobs will stay the same.

There are already robots that can do things that humans can't. For example, a robot in Australia can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour, which would take two humans a long time to do. Another robot in the US helps keep supermarkets clean and makes sure products are in stock.

Some people think that robots will create new jobs for technicians and programmers. Others worry that robots will take away the human touch and make it hard for people to work together.

A expert on robots, Dr. Jing Bing Zhang, says that we need to be prepared for the changes that robots will bring. He thinks that people should learn new skills to adapt to the changes.

In the future, we will see new kinds of robots that can help us in our daily lives. These robots will be very smart and will be able to work with us. This will create new opportunities for companies, but it will also bring new challenges, like making sure we are safe and private.

We need to learn more about science, technology, engineering, and maths (STEM) to be prepared for the future."<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A1:

'Why do people climb mountains? One famous climber, George Mallory, said "Because it's there." This answer is simple, but it's true. Climbing mountains is a big adventure. Some people love the feeling of freedom when they climb. They like to challenge themselves and try new things. But climbing can also be very hard and scary. Sometimes, climbers get stuck in bad weather or have to wait in a tent for a long time.

Some people think climbing is a way to learn important skills like being brave, humble, and respectful of nature. Climbing can help us become better people. Others believe that climbing is in our nature - we are born to take risks and try new things. 

Climbing can also be a way to relax and feel calm. The physical work of climbing can be meditative, like a kind of exercise for the mind. Some people even think that climbing is like a way to train the mind to be peaceful, like in Zen philosophy.

So, why do people climb? There is no one answer. Climbing is a personal choice. Some people do it for fun, some for adventure, and some to learn and grow.'<|eot_id|>

Now, Brendel is 80 years old and is enjoying his retirement. He still thinks about music and wants to play more, but his body is not strong enough. He is happy to see Kit becoming a good pianist and is proud of his progress.'

My grandfather's garden was special. It was near a river and had a gentle slope. You couldn't get to the river, but you could hear the sound of the water and the birds singing. I thought all gardens were like this - a peaceful place. My grandfather's garden wasn't special because it had a big greenhouse like some of his friends. Their greenhouses were made from old windows. My father was a quiet person. He wasn't always happy, but he liked silly things. He had a funny phrase he liked to use: "It's immaterial to me." He wasn't very ambitious, but he was good at fixing things around the house. My parents moved houses only once, but my mother liked to buy new furniture. We got a piano, but I never got to play it. My sister had lessons, but I never did. I liked the river best. I could go there with my imagination and pretend. I would take a fishing net and walk along the riverbank, looking for fish. My father wanted me to be a gardener. He thought I would be good at it. He wasn't sure, but he hoped I would do well.

I'm on a small island called the Isle of Muck. A man named Lawrence MacEwen is showing me around. His dog, Tie, is with us. The wind is strong, but Lawrence is happy here. He knows the island well. He points to another island and says, 'That one is Eigg. The one next to it is Rum. It gets more rain than we do.' I see big clouds bringing rain to Rum.

Lawrence and I go down the hill. He tells me about the island. It's 3 kilometers long and half as wide. The geese eat a lot of grass. The MacEwens have lived here for 3000 years.

We need to move the sheep. Tie, the dog, is not doing a good job. 'Away to me, Tie,' Lawrence says. The dog doesn't listen. Lawrence is not happy. The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence's wife, Jenny, and son, Colin, help him with the farm.

We have some problems on the island. We don't always have electricity. Sometimes we have to use a torch for light. There is no mobile phone signal, so we can't use our phones. But we like it here. We like the music and the food. We even have a concert on the island. Lawrence tells me how he met his wife, Jenny. She came to manage a farm on another island. She didn't know much about farming, but she learned.

I go to bed and wake up to more rain. But I eat well. We get our food from the island. We even get fresh fish from the sea. If my ferry doesn't come, I might have to stay on the island for two more days. But I'm happy to stay.<|eot_id|>

Here is the simplified text for a level A1 learner:

'Long ago, video game designers were mostly computer experts or people who taught themselves. People thought it was just a hobby for young people. But now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It's hard to get a job in this industry. You need to work hard and be good at many things. Jim Donelly says, "It's hard to make a good game, but it's worth it. You need to make games to get a job. The tools are available. You won't get a job if you don't make something."
